San Francisco, CA.

Twilio is looking for someone to help build the latest, greatest version of the Twilio API, to make sure it's capable of scaling as we continue to grow. Looking for candidates who are HTTP nerds, passionate about REST and API design.

If you're interested, feel free to contact me directly - kevin@twilio.com.

We're hiring for a boatload of other positions as well - we have listings online here, https://www.jobscore.com/jobs/twilio/.
